00035 #include "btkDTFPLikelihoodDensity.h"
00036 
00037 
00038 // STL includes
00039 #include "cassert"
00040 #include "cmath"
00041 
00042 // ITK includes
00043 #include "itkDiffusionTensor3D.h"
00044 #include "itkFixedArray.h"
00045 #include "itkMatrix.h"
00046 
00047 // default 0.25
00048 #define Tau 0.25
00049 
00050 
00051 namespace btk
00052 {
00053 
00054 DTFPLikelihoodDensity::DTFPLikelihoodDensity(DTFPSignal *signal)
00055 {
00056     assert(signal);
00057 
00058 
00059     m_signal = signal;
00060 
00061     m_directions = m_signal->getDirections();
00062     m_sigmas     = m_signal->getSigmas();
00063 
00064   m_logSqrt2PI = std::log(std::sqrt(2. * M_PI));
00065 }
00066 
00067 Real DTFPLikelihoodDensity::compute(Direction uk, Point xk, Direction mean)
00068 {
00069     Real density = 0;
00070     itk::DiffusionTensor3D<Real> tensor = m_signal->DiffusionTensorAt(xk);
00071 
00072     itk::FixedArray<Real,3> eigenValues;
00073     itk::Matrix<Real,3,3> eigenVectors;
00074     tensor.ComputeEigenAnalysis(eigenValues,eigenVectors);
00075 //    Pr(eigenValues[0]); Pr(eigenValues[1]); Pr(eigenValues[2]);
00076 //    Pr(eigenVectors(0,0)); Pr(eigenVectors(0,1)); Pr(eigenVectors(0,2));
00077 //    Pr(eigenVectors(1,0)); Pr(eigenVectors(1,1)); Pr(eigenVectors(1,2));
00078 //    Pr(eigenVectors(2,0)); Pr(eigenVectors(2,1)); Pr(eigenVectors(2,2));
00079 
00080     Real cl = (eigenValues[2] - eigenValues[1]) / std::sqrt(eigenValues[2]*eigenValues[2] + eigenValues[1]*eigenValues[1] + eigenValues[0]*eigenValues[0]);
00081 
00082     if(cl > Tau)
00083     {
00084         Real lortho = (eigenValues[1] + eigenValues[0]) / 2.0;
00085         Real lbar   = tensor.GetTrace() / 3.0;
00086         Matrix S    = m_signal->signalAt(xk);
00087 
00088         unsigned int i=0;
00089         for(std::vector<Vector>::iterator g = m_directions->begin(); g != m_directions->end(); g++, i++)
00090         {
00091             Real mesuredSignal   = S(i,0);
00092 
00093             Vector v = uk.toVector();
00094             Real scalarProd = v.x()*g->x() + v.y()*g->y() + v.z()*g->z();
00095             Real estimatedSignal = m_signal->BaselineAt(xk) * std::exp( -(Real)m_signal->GetBValue() * ( lortho + 3.0*(scalarProd*scalarProd) * (lbar - lortho) ) );
00096 
00097             density += this->computeNormalDensity(m_sigmas->at(i), std::log(mesuredSignal) - std::log(estimatedSignal));
00098         } // for i
00099     }
00100     else // cl <= Tau
00101     {
00102         Real moySigma = 0;
00103         for(std::vector<Real>::iterator sigma = m_sigmas->begin(); sigma != m_sigmas->end(); sigma++)
00104             moySigma += (*sigma)/m_sigmas->size();
00105 
00106         Vector v = uk.toVector();
00107         Real scalarProd = v.x()*eigenVectors(0,0) + v.y()*eigenVectors(0,1) + v.z()*eigenVectors(0,2);
00108         Real coeff      = 1.0 / ( moySigma * std::sqrt(2.0*M_PI) );
00109         Real exponent   = ( std::acos(scalarProd) - M_PI/2.0 ) / moySigma;
00110         density = std::log( coeff * std::exp(-0.5 * (exponent*exponent)) * 1.0/(2.0*M_PI) );
00111     }
00112 
00113     return density;
00114 }
00115 
00116 Real DTFPLikelihoodDensity::computeNormalDensity(Real sigma, Real x)
00117 {
00118     if(sigma != 0)
00119     {
00120         Real fraction = x / sigma;
00121 
00122         return ( -std::log(sigma) - m_logSqrt2PI - 0.5 * fraction * fraction );
00123     }
00124     else
00125         return 1;
00126 }
00127 
00128 } // namespace btk
